alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler; Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:25PM EDT until July 24 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Schuyler County in central New York... Chemung County in central New York... Southeastern Steuben County in central New York... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 325 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gang Mills, or near Corning, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elmira, Corning, Southport, Big Flats, Horseheads, Elmira Heights, Campbell, Caton, Lindley and Watkins Glen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
